resources.string: This app is run by Corallium, a student-led organization trying to spread awareness about dying coral reefs. (We also raise a coral tank!)
The main functions on this app are the schedule, Corallium Calendar, submitting reimbursement forms, and a blog for non-members!
If you are a Corallium member, ask @Poke/Thomas ZHOU for your specific login details.

Corallium was invited to be part of YCIS\'s Open Day, where we had a booth on the ground floor. We sold homemade coral-themed cookies that were made by the team, and we also had a minigame about tank maintenance.
We sold out all 200 of our cookies in just under 2 hours, and almost every single customer played the minigame as well, and some even followed our Instagram @coralliumhk.
